pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generally Useful Functions // Provides simple "base R"-like functions, such as %notin% (mirroring %in%), se (standard error, mirroring e.g. sd()), quick rounding of a mixed-class object (mirroring round()), count[ing] (mirroring e.g. sum(), mean(), etc.), and an aggregate function (mirroring aggregate()) that can also do pivoting.
